content: 7 & 8 to prevent hole work across next 24 28 32 36 rnds 17 & 18 b repeat rnds 5 & 6 instep sts beginning after the round you left off in rnds 19 & 20 a repeat rnds 3 & 4 patterning ie round 7 if working a shortie 72 78 rnds 21 & 22 b repeat rnds 1 & 2 88 94 sts rnds 23 & 24 a *k3 sl1 k4 repeat from * to end note sizes 2& 4 instep the front of the foot will start halfway through a repeat see page 7 for repeat rnds 1-22 once more alternatively work until written instructions / chart for this your required length ending after a round using yarn b 6 shape gusset do not cut yarn b remove borm round 1 a k1 ssk k 9 8 9 8 pm k 24 28 32 36 pm k 9 8 9 8 k2tog k1 pm gusset m work 3 heel flap corresponding round of patterning over the worked over next 24 28 32 36 sts with rs facing instep pm for bor 70 76 86 92 sts and yarn a only work back and forth as follows round 2 b k to 1stm sm work corresponding round of row1 *sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to end patterning over next 24 28 32 36 sts to 2ndm row2 sl1 wyif p to end sm k to gusset m sm work corresponding round of repeat row 1 & 2 a further 15 15 17 17 times 32 32 36 patterning over the next 24 28 32 36 sts 36 row in total rowrow and kades page 4 daedalus socks - dk pattern round 3 b k1 ssk k to m sm work corresponding 7 foot round of patterning over the next 24 28 32 36 sm k to 3 sts before gusset m k2tog k1 work continue without shaping and keeping pattern corresponding pattern round over the instep continuity using patterning all around the sock 68 74 84 90 sts until foot meas 20 5 21 5 23 24 5 cm / 8 8 5 9 round 4 a k to 1stm sm work corresponding round of 9 5 in from back of heel or 4 4 4 4 5 cm / patterning over next 24 28 32 36 sts to 2nd 1 5 1 5 1 5 1 75 in less than desired foot length m sm k to gusset m sm work corresponding ending after a round using yarn b round of patterning over the next 24 28 32 36 sts 8 toe cut yarn b and using yarn a only repeat rnds 3 & 4 switching colours accordingly round 1 knit and shaping the gusset decreasing every other round 2 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm repeat round and keeping pattern continuity over the from * once more 44 52 60 68 sts instep until you have 2 sts between
